verbose_text: For example, the increase in cytoplasmic cAMP level following beta-adrenergic receptor stimulation appears to have a role in mediating Mg 2+ mobilization from mitochondria [XREF_BIBR], but it is unknown as to whether cAMP has any effect on the mitochondrial Mrs2 channel that allows Mg 2+ entry into the organelle [XREF_BIBR], thus favoring its subsequent redistribution.
